articles.author: Alex Leary, Aruna Viswanatha and Sadie Gurman
articles.title: FBI Recovered 11 Sets of Classified Documents in Trump Search, Inventory Shows
articles.description: Some of the documents recovered from the former president’s home were marked top secret and meant to be kept in special facilities, an inventory showed. Trump allies claim he declassified the documents.

articles.title: At least 14 people injured after vehicle crashes into Virginia pub, police say
articles.description: At least 14 people were injured on Friday after a vehicle crashed into an Arlington, Virginia pub and caused a structure fire, police said.
articles.content:
(CNN)At least 14 people were injured on Friday after a vehicle crashed into an Arlington, Virginia, pub and caused a structure fire, police said.

articles.title: Southern Baptist Convention Says It Faces Federal Investigation for Sexual Abuse
articles.description: Church leaders disclosed that multiple Southern Baptist entities were under investigation and said that all would cooperate.

articles.author: Joshua Goodman
articles.title: Author Salman Rushdie stabbed on lecture stage in New York
articles.description: CHAUTAUQUA, N.Y. (AP) — Salman Rushdie, whose novel “The Satanic Verses” drew death threats from Iran’s leader in the 1980s, was stabbed in the neck and abdomen Friday by a man who rushed the stage as the author was about to give a lecture in western New York.

articles.title: An armed man tried to enter the FBI's Cincinnati office and was fatally shot after a standoff with police. Here's what we know
